structure.unit: A AUTOMATED MOTOR VEHICLE REGISTRATION SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Written disclosure of damages to motor vehicle.

text.section:
An individual, or a dealer required to be licensed pursuant to KRS Chapter 190, shall disclose all damages to a motor vehicle:
Of which the individual or the dealer has direct knowledge;
Which result in repairs or repair estimates that exceed one thousand dollars ($1,000); and
That occur while the motor vehicle is in the individual's or the dealer's possession and prior to delivery to a purchaser.
Disclosure under this section shall be in writing and shall require the purchaser's signature acknowledging the disclosure of damages.

law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 54, sec. 2, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 7, effective February 22, 2000. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 243, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1994.
